item.name: 10 Jahre alea: Schatzkiste
item.comment: *Loius IV expansion is pointless...

item.name: 1960: The Making of the President
item.comment:
*Not nearly as good as Twilight Struggle, but good enough. Maybe if I had played this one before Twilight, I would have different opinion. This is a great game still, one of the best so far, but for now I give it a solid 7 for 2 main reasons: 1) Game is heavily language dependent, so it is hard for me to find partners to play the game with. 2) I cannot not to think about Twilight Struggle when playing it.
Still, one of the best 2 player games out there. Great buy anyway.

item.name: Les 3 Petits Cochons et le Grand Méchant Loup
item.originalname: 3 Little Pigs and the Big Bad Wolf
item.comment: *The smaller version is actually better since the houses are easier to blow over the wolf head. It was hard for the kids to get the houses over in the larger version.

item.name: 6 Võtab
item.comment: *Very weird game for me! I have no idea why, but i don't like this game. I gave it 7 points because i see this potential, but this game is just not for me. Seemed even kinda funny how uncomfortable this was. Hard to learn also.

item.name: 7 Surmapattu
item.comment: *I was quite happy to get the game. It looked great and the idea seemed like a great party game. When opening up the game, it looked so cool. The game mat/board was so beautiful and the playing pieces was so so great looking, but then came the actual game. The game was bad and boring. Just roll the dice, make some moves and then, game ends and that is that. It just ends, with no emotion at all. Boring.

item.name: 7 Wonders
item.comment: *Not at all what I expected, but still not a bad game. It is unique in a way that you can play a game with a high number of player with so little time. Game has strategy, but a luck still has its part in the game, so everyone can get "lucky" with the game. Easy to learn and teach. Lived up to the hype!

item.name: 9 Letter Word
item.comment: *Great abstract game. Easy to learn, fun to play, hard to get good at. All you need from one game.

item.name: A-Ü
item.comment:
*Thies new edition I got (second estonian) is better for two reasons.
1) they added multiple letter like v/w and some others 2) a lot more topics
So this great game is made even better...

item.name: A-Ü
item.comment: *I really really like this game! I have always considered myself a mainstreamer. This is the king of all word games, as much as i have played them (read A LOT)! Sometimes the annoying timer makes me angry, but thats part of the beauty. The main idea in this game is really really easy, but since some topics are little too wide and none of them are explained closer in the rules, sometimes that causes a little arguments over some words that someone said. What bothers me little is some topics like "Words that describe you" or "What children like to do"...how to you limit your words - whats wrong whats right! Anyway, really really great word game. Recommend!

item.name: The Adventurers: The Temple of Chac
item.comment: *Really FUN game. There have been so many great games with this one. The last minute escapes are amazing and the treasure hunts and different traps.! :D I love the game...

item.name: Ad•Astra
item.comment: *Really good game. It is said before that it is like Settlers Of Catan in space and that is somewhat true. There are so many similarities like upgrading colony to factory and collecting different ore cards. I really like this game probably for the same reasons. Great game.

item.name: Aeg Maha
item.comment: *Really great math/logic game! Since math is my strongest side i have absolutely nothing against this game. I like the no luck part of this game. Either you know or you don't. If just depend on your luck, you will not get high score. I even have a little paper inside the box, with the TOP 3 of high scores and dates that they are made of. My name is only 3rd:(. I guess more practicing is needed:D, but no problem, since this game is playable by yourself only, so hands on and practice! Recommend!

item.name: Afrikan tähti
item.comment: *My second version and newer version of that very good game!

item.name: Agricola
item.comment: *Wow! A great game! Very cool things can happen, but I didn't like that the game ended so fast. You need to think always and hard to get like 60 points! Recommend!

item.name: Air Hockey
item.comment: *Air Hockey - I have one version I found perfect from a thrift store! Great game! :D

item.name: Ajateenija
item.comment: *Well, this is my own game, so I have to say that this game actually got pretty great. There are some problems with civilian players, but well, the game were not made for civilians. It will come out soon..

item.name: Aladdin's Dragons
item.comment: *I like this game. It looks beautiful and it is sneaky game. You can at the beginning of the game buy all the artifacts for so cheap, that later you just own the game...Very entertaining game!

item.name: Alfredo's Food Fight
item.comment: *Since I'm a very big kids game fan, I like this one also. This has beautiful game pieces, with high quality and easy game play as it is with these kind of games. Needs some skill and with some time, can be mastered actually. I was able to make some serious shots after few games. Recommend to all kids out there...

item.name: Ali Baba
item.comment: *Well. To be honest, this game is boring. NOT really boring, but still boring. I consider this more like childrens game. I have absolutely nothing good to say about this game. Playable maybe twice, not more. Maybe fun with kids...

item.name: Alias
item.comment: *Ok. Alias is king of all party games in Estonia. I play this game like twice week in average. I i really like this game. I think (read: I know and I'm sure) that i'm not only one who loves t his game. This game is awesome and fun. I have played this game with over 100 different people and everyone so far have loved this. Every home around here has this game in their home (like Scrabble in USA) and know the game. Well, with this game no words are good enough. It may seem to be a little exaggeration, but its really really not. I have 2 different Alias, the old one (the best one) and the new one with two different sides. Not so good, but still, very very good, compering to other games that type. Really do recommend!

item.name: Alias
item.comment: Ok. Alias is king of all party games in Estonia. I play this game like twice week in average. I i really like this game. I think (read: I know and I'm sure) that i'm not only one who loves t his game. This game is awesome and fun. I have played this game with over 100 different people and everyone so far have loved this. Every home around here has this game in their home (like Scrabble in USA) and know the game. Well, with this game no words are good enough. It may seem to be a little exaggeration, but its really really not. I have 2 different Alias, the old one (the best one) and the new one with two different sides. Not so good, but still, very very good, compering to other games that type. Really do recommend!

item.name: Alias
item.comment: Ok. Alias is king of all party games in Estonia. I play this game like twice week in average. I i really like this game. I think (read: I know and I'm sure) that i'm not only one who loves t his game. This game is awesome and fun. I have played this game with over 100 different people and everyone so far have loved this. Every home around here has this game in their home (like Scrabble in USA) and know the game. Well, with this game no words are good enough. It may seem to be a little exaggeration, but its really really not. I have 2 different Alias, the old one (the best one) and the new one with two different sides. Not so good, but still, very very good, compering to other games that type. Really do recommend!

item.name: Alias Taskuformaadis
item.comment: *Not as good as the original Alias, but still best party games out there....

item.name: Amazonas
item.comment: *I really liked the game. It seems to be cross-breed from TTR and PowerGrid... Easy and fast game, beautiful looking as well. I mean, what is there not to like.

item.name: Aquadukt
item.comment: *One of my favourite games out there. It has something that I like. Maybe it is because I'm in the pipes business or I don't know. Great game still...

item.name: Arcana
item.comment: *Very surprised about this game. Very good and different game, than I was looking for. Will play this one again and again.

item.name: Arctic Survival
item.comment: *I only bought this game because of it theme - ice and arctic. I have so far only seen great games with that kind of theme, but his one was to be honest, quite boring. It had some strategy in it, but for overall, it is quite boring and slow game. Thank god for the rule, you cannot move the same tile your opponent just did, because without that rule, the game would be just one bog chaos...

item.name: Ärihai
item.comment: *After the first play I was kinda disappointed about the game, but after the game with the designer and my friend I have to say that this is not at all a bad economic game. I know, I know, economic games have extremely high standard and they all suffer under the Monopoly complex, but I think that this one with a little tweaking and work can pull it through...

item.name: Arkadia
item.comment: *One of the best actual building games I know. It gives so much varieties and options for you and also, is easy to play and teach. Great game.

item.name: Arkham Horror
item.comment: *One of the best game I have played. I didn't gave the game 10 because it takes so much time to find something from the rules and the set up is bitch...:D

item.name: Armada 3
item.comment: *I liked the game, but I really really don't like the Armada 3 (euro games) playing content. Really uncomfortable to place those pirate units and the flags are way too small. Really annoying and takes so much fun out of the game, just to mess around with those pieces all the time...

item.name: Aronda
item.comment: It is a OK game, nothing more....

item.name: Around the World in 80 Days
item.comment: *Great and fun game for the whole family with easy and fast rules. This game is one of my favorites just because it can be played so fast, so this one will get a lot of playing time.

item.name: Ascension: Chronicle of the Godslayer
item.comment: *Really easy and great card game! I would have to say that game play is better than Dominion, but overall not so good! :D

item.name: Atlantis
item.comment: *Most fun game in awhile. Really easy game and quick to learn and now i know that with a whirl you don't want your people to be near (I had six of them there). FAIL! Ok, very good game, recommend to everyone!

item.name: Atoll
item.comment: Great abstract strategy game!

item.name: Aton
item.comment: *Well, haven't played that game much, but can say, that this game has nothing new. Actually liked this game. I like this kind of thinking games, where in the beginning you know exactly what cards you will have, but how you start and what do choose. This a game on consequences. Well, may be hard to learn, but once its learned you will love it and its simplicity. Basically just collect points (like every game) and stop other from doing that. Recommend!

item.name: Attack!
item.comment: *From the very little war games I have played I liked this one. I really don't like all the dice rolling and luck that comes with that, but still way better than Risk...

item.name: Ausbrecher AG
item.comment: *Very entertaining! 10 points! Very good game! Recommend!

item.name: Autosõit
item.comment: *Autosõit - Quite lazy edition of the game and even lazy for a game like Snakes and Ladders.

item.name: Ave Caesar
item.comment: *Fun game and sometimes makes me angry with all the blocking and stuff, but since there many different variants that problem is curable! Recommend

item.name: Aviation Game
item.comment: *Classic game, nothing more to add...great as a child! This version (Aviation Game) there are these great big airplanes!

item.name: Babel
item.comment: *To be honest, I find this game little boring. It doesn't have that much options as it seems in the beginning and the game play is slow...

item.name: Backgammon
item.comment: *Classic game! That kind of game will never die and with good reason. If you for some reason haven't played Backgammon yet, then start today! Easy, fun and for every age! Recommend!

item.name: Barbie Interactive Quiz
item.comment: *The whole interactive quiz game theme is great. Especially the 2 player packets. Kids really do enjoy these ones...

item.name: Barn-Alfapet
item.comment: *I gave this game 4 because I really can't play it. I need to now Swedish to play this one, but i really don't that good. I still tried to play and it was some kind of game...but not very good.

item.name: The Battle for Hill 218
item.comment: *Truly a great card game. I am surprised how easy technique can make so easy game and good game. This one is waiting for a great opponent and it will get more table time...

item.name: Battle Line
item.comment: *Another great Knizia game. When i played it, i always kept thinking that this is Minotaur Lords/Scarab Lords. Very good game. I like the rule about not letting use Tactics cards more than one more than your opponents. This keeps game closer! Very good game!

item.name: Battleship
item.comment: *Classic game that I used to play in my classes. But this way and now that i'm that much older it is still a fun game. Little easy for the lack of strategy, but still, very playable. I have both the big and the travel one, so I actually tend to play this from time to time!

item.name: Beowulf
item.comment: *Not as good game as the Beowulf: Legend game, but still a very good boar game! :D

item.name: Beowulf: The Legend
item.comment: *I have to say that I'm very surprised with the game. I didn't expect it to be so much fun and with so well flowing. Not a dull moment in the game...

item.name: Berserk: Tactical Card Game – War of Realms
Biblios
item.comment:
*Great auction game. It reminds me some games, but it really has a great strategy. It is fast and easy game, easy to play, easy to teach.
Btw, the game cards stinch...

item.name: Billy Biber
item.comment: *Since I love all children games, it is no wonder I like this one as well. Just push out the logs and hope the little guys doesn't fall. If you have small kids, around 4, this is the game for you....

item.name: Billy Biber
item.comment: *The mini version is actually better than the larger one.

item.name: Black Cat
item.comment: *Game we played a lot in my army service. One of my buddies knew the game and thought it to me.

item.name: Blackjack
item.comment: *As far as the gambling card games go, this one is one of my favorite games! :D

item.name: Blockster
item.comment: *Not my kind of game. Seemed great at start, but after like 15 minutes got tired of the game and basically never want to play it again. Seems to be for kids.

item.name: Blue Moon
item.comment: *Another great Kinizia card game. It has great potential. So far I have played with 4 decks only, but with them the game is great one to play. Easy to play, fast as well. Great filler, but not his best card game!

item.name: Blue Moon City
item.comment: *Ok. I am a big fan of Reiner, but I'm not pleased with this game. Very boring for me. Seriously. People are praising this game and I just don't see why! Very boring game. Kinda like waste of time, because i have so many better games to play!

item.name: Blue Moon: Fire Spirit
item.comment: *Discarding other players hand is always good thing. Gives something extra for the deck for sure.

item.name: Blue Moon: The Flit
item.comment: *This pack as one whole sucks. Without custom decks it is hard to beat someone with this deck. It has a few character cards and no support cards at all, plus leadership cards are the weakest ones I have seen so far. Weak race in the Blue Moon world...

item.name: Blue Moon: The Khind
item.comment: *Well, a lot better than Flit race, but still not balanced deck of cards. It has only 4 support cards and no booster, huge number of character cards. If you know when and how to combo (group) the cards, it can be a great deck, but for beginners, quite disappointing.

item.name: Blue Moon: Water Spirit
item.comment: *When used at the right time can save the day. Very useful card with Flit, since that deck has very few character cards.

item.name: Bluff
item.comment: *Not a fan of this one. I actually don't like dice games at all. Not a fan of luck games per se. This one seemed to be like good game when I got it, but after playing it couple of time, I really don't want to play again!

item.name: The BoardGameGeek Game
item.comment: *I actually liked this game a lot. I read some bad things about the game, but in the end it turned out to be really fun game where you can be clever or just plain lucky! :D

item.name: Boing, Boing Tigger
item.comment: *Well, it is hard to find any differences between this one and Buckaroo. My small niece loves this game though...

item.name: Bonnie and Clyde
item.comment: *Great card game! I was surprised to find how much I actually liked the game. It is better than the classical Rummy game and in this Rummy you can also hoard card into your hands, since they won't get you any minus points! :D

item.name: Bootleggers
item.comment: *Well, this game is fun! I like the truck this game has! Actually, this game has so many great attributes that it is simpler just to play it and give it 10 points...

item.name: Börja läsa
item.comment: *Another thrift find for me and in perfect condition. Game itself offers very little, but as classical game, it still a small pearl in my collection.

item.name: Bridge
item.comment: *One of the classical card games I haven't really learned to play to this day! I lose almost every time I play the game and still I try to play it again and again.

item.name: Die Brücke am Rio D'Oro
item.comment: Ok family game. Plays best when all are out to get each other.

item.name: Buckaroo!
item.comment: *Ok. I do like childrens games, but this one i have tried couple of time with kids, but I'm not satisfied. First game the donkey actually jumped, but second time kids were really careful and the donkey never jumped. So not very nerve wrecking like promised!

item.name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: The Game
item.comment: *I was very surprised to see how good the game actually is. I really really like this game. Some scenarios might be long, when two equal players are against each other, but in all ways, this game delivers. Me and my girlfriend love this game and give this one some table time as well for that...

item.name: Bullen Reiten
item.comment: *Just another version of Buckaroo (Bullen Reiten). This one is with the rider, and the bull spins as well, so lot more excitement and more fun...

item.name: Bump in the Night
item.comment: *Well, I have to say that the game is actually quite boring... It has very little strategy and once you have all the monsters places, it just collecting points...

item.name: Caesar & Cleopatra
item.comment: *I love the Kosmos 2-player series a lot and this game is no different. Great game with lot of possibilities to outsmart your opponent. Recommend...

item.name: Campaign Manager 2008
item.comment: Great 2 player game. Not the best from Jason Matthews, but still a great one.

item.name: Can't Stop!
item.comment: Very clever game that I actually have beaten in the first play. It is possible if you nerves can take the heat. Very good addiction control game. Recommend.

item.name: Can't Stop!
item.comment: Second copy. Very clever game that I actually have beaten in the first play. It is possible if you nerves can take the heat. Very good addiction control game. Recommend.

item.name: Candy Land
item.comment: Since Candy Land wasn't traditional to Estonia, I recently played the game for the first time myself. Well, it is kids game, but I didn't like it at all. How do a color blind person would play this one?

item.name: Carcassonne
item.comment: I actually don't know how to describe this game. This game is for sure very good game, no doubt about that. Very strategic and a lot different every time you play it. Recommend.

item.name: Carcassonne - Die Jäger und Sammler
item.comment: Not as good as the original Carcassonne I think. Or maybe I'm just little old fashioned...

item.name: Carcassonne: The River
item.comment: Don't see the point of this one!!!

item.name: Cars: Radiator Springs Rallye
item.comment: I like racing games and this little game is no exception. I gave the game 6 points, because it is actually fun. I didn't expect a lot from this, but it is not bad. I have the one with small expansion - 2 extra road tiles and 4 new cars. So now I can play the game with up to 10 players.

item.name: Cars: Radiator Springs Rallye Small Expansion
item.comment: Pretty much pointless expansion...

item.name: Cartagena
item.comment: Very interesting racing game. Kinda reminds of the old classical Hare & Tortoise game, but more developed. There are quite a few tactics you can use in this game. The skill version with the arrow card and open cards are more suited for pro players, since it makes your head ache when you try to over think all your opponents. Great fun racing game...

item.name: Cashflow 101
item.comment: Quite boring game actually and very easy game! I don't see things that everyone were talking about... Usual game...

item.name: Cass' Baraque
item.comment: I see no point in this game. I usually like children games a lot, but this one leaves me baffled. The last house is impossible to blow broken. It just won't break.

item.name: Catan Card Game
item.comment: I actually liked this game, but it was a little too long for me. Very easy and great game. If you like Settlers of Catan (everyone) then i think, that you should play this game with pleasure. Very good card game. Maybe the best card game I have played! Recommend!

item.name: Catch A Pizza
item.comment: I was surprised how fun the game actually is:D Recommend

item.name: Cave Troll
item.comment: Ok. It is a game, thats it. Nothing special about it. Gave it a seven because i like the way the game looks, thats it!

item.name: Caylus
item.comment: It took so long time to learn it but once you know it, you love it. Great strategy game!

item.name: Celebrities
item.comment: Played a lot as a kids. Still love the game.

item.name: Change Horses
item.comment: Not the greatest horse games I have played. Actually I think this game is quite boring when you compare it to other horse games like Winner's Circle, Horse Fever, Turf Master, Long Shot etc... but when you take this as a deduction game, it works actually quite well.

item.name: Chat' Trappe
item.comment: Actually I like this game. It demands a little reaction from the players, but it is fun and dexterity as well, but you actually have to be careful not to hurt yourself!

item.name: Chinese Checkers
item.comment: Well, I'm a big abstarct strategy fan and this one is good. If you don't have it yet, then get it and enjoy it!

item.name: Choco
item.comment: Good children game for about five minutes. After that you never play that again!

item.name: The Christmas Game
item.comment: Quite beautiful game and with nice soundtrack too. Game is worth playing once or twice:D

item.name: Citadels
item.comment: Not bad card game. I have played better card games. This game is about average in card games. Entertaining and for sure you won't have to regret it.

item.name: Citadels: The Dark City
item.comment: Made game little too easy! Still, worth owning.

item.name: Clans
item.comment: Very good strategical game! I like how you always have to move all five colors instead your own. Very good game! Recommend!

item.name: The Club
item.comment: Well, this game was not at what I expected. This is game for memory. More like a adult memory game. Not very much to do when you have photo memory...

item.name: Clue
item.comment: This one is my army made version of the great game and we actually all liked the game, although I didn't do a very good job putting it together!

item.name: Cluedo
item.comment: Big clue fan. Deduction at its best! Recommend with ease!

item.name: Cocot Folie
item.comment: Pretty much Hungry Hungry Hippos, few minor differences. But it is harder at least...

item.name: Cold War: CIA vs KGB
item.comment: I really enjoyed the game. The theme is only necessary with the Agnet-X cards, but that is where the strategy is hidden. Mind games are awesome when you try to think what you opponent is trying to do and why he/she is not trying to go higher than he is going! Great game.

item.name: Coloretto
item.comment: Not very good card game!

item.name: Colossal Arena
item.comment: Seemed to be a little dull after reading the rules, but after playing I finally got the game and it has some great possibilities. Great game.

item.name: Columbus
item.comment: I have to say that I liked this game. It has some strategy and some tactical decisions to be made, but it has way too many ways to get trapped and if you have no tile drawing luck the game is basically lost. Still, another great surprise from Ravensburgers glory days...

item.name: ConHex
item.comment: I really like this one...

item.name: Connect 4
item.comment: Classic game. I played this one in kindergarten and still love it. Very simple and still hard one if you have a good opponent! Recommend to math geeks out there!

item.name: Crazy
item.comment: Fun adults game. This game is good for very good company. You don't want to play this in a unfamiliar company, it might get bad. Recommend to all party gamers.

item.name: Creeps!
item.comment: Fun to play with kids for couple of times. Sadly they are not interested long enough...

item.name: Croc Dog
item.comment: One of the best kids games I own. This one has it all. It makes you think and you try to be as careful as you can, but the dog still awakes and when it does, it creeps every one out...great fun! :D

item.name: Crossfire
item.comment: Great fun for kids and the guns make a really fast shots, so be careful...

item.name: Crystal Code
item.comment: Little weird game, I have to admit. But after coupe of games I got the idea and got actually pretty good at the code breaking. Recommend.

item.name: Cuadrados Magicos
item.comment: Weird game. This game wants to be Ubongo, but fails bad at that...

item.name: Cuba
item.comment: Very very good game. It reminds me a lot of different games, but still playable. One I will take that game and El Presidente and try them out.

item.name: Cubus
item.comment: Very cool 3D game. A little hard at first, but when your eyes get used to it, then it actually quite easy game! Very cool game:D

item.name: Cuisto Dingo
item.comment: This game makes me laugh... You actually stuff hamburgers down his throat...until the belly bursts,...who thought that?? Still, great fun for kids....

item.name: Curli Kuller
item.comment: I have to admit, that this one is quite fun to play. The last crop is hard to get down, but it will always fall..:D

item.name: Danse Macabre
item.comment: Surprisingly good game for Estonia, has a potential for more games. Still, if to compare to other games...

item.name: Das Verrückte Labyrinth
item.comment: Not as good as the master version, less options here and easier to get to the treasures. Basically still the same game as the other ones.

item.name: Das Weiss Doch Jedes Kind?!
item.originalname: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader?
item.comment: German edition has the same pointless questions. Seems the language doesn't make a difference, the game itself is no good.

item.name: Day & Night
item.comment: I liked the theme and the art, but the game has something lacking for me. Not really sure what it is, but isn't as interesting as I hoped it would be.

item.name: Dead Man's Treasure
item.comment: Not at all what I expected. Another game where the theme is just pasted on for fun...

item.name: Delma: Linnas
item.comment: Pointless.

item.name: Deluxe Boggle
item.comment: *I'm a sucker for word games, so this one is no exception. Waiting for Estonian edition, but so far it can still be played with English version.

item.name: Den försvunna diamanten
item.comment: OK! I'm sure that most people here (Europe) have played this game in their childhood. This was like THE game in those days. Now this is just another game, but the nostalgic memories will be here for good...

item.name: Den Forsvunne Diamant
item.comment: OK! I'm sure that most people here (Europe) have played this game in their childhood. This was like THE game in those days. Now this is just another game, but the nostalgic memories will be here for good...

item.name: Den Förtrollade Skogen
item.comment: Older version of the game I already have. This one looks more beautiful than Ravensburger English edition.

item.name: Die Siedler von Catan
item.comment: Same game I have, but German version!

item.name: Die Siedler von Catan - Das Kartenspiel
Digging
item.comment: Well, it is a card game. Not really much options you have here, basically just choosing between two if possible or just play only card you can play. For 2 and 3 players, this game sucks. For teams, it has some potential...

item.name: Dingbats
item.comment: Big fan of the word puzzle game. I would like to have all 3 of them:D

item.name: Dinomeal
item.comment: Almost the same game as Croc Dog, but it is little more fun actually. In this you have to actually hold the leaf with your hand, so at one moment very suddenly, the dinosaur will actually bite it, but it won't hurt..:D Cool...

item.name: Discovery
item.comment: This very rare game is actually quite good. Paulig took some time when they made this one. Trivia is well thought trough, but other wise this game is like Afrikan Tähti with trivia! Recommend.

item.name: Dixit
item.comment: Everything I could ask from a party game!

item.name: Dixit 2
item.comment: Well, all I have to say: SUPERB!

item.name: Dixit 2: "The American" promo card
item.comment: Little limited in my opinion. We had this one in play as a "Savisaar"...no one didn't fall for it.

item.name: Doktor Bibber
item.comment: Much better than the old classic version!

item.name: Dominion
item.comment: This one became our (me and Agnes) favourite game from the very first play. This one gets to played a lot in our house...best card game I know..

item.name: Dominion: Alchemy
item.comment: Well, there are so many things I'm not happy with. Well, the card Possession is one of them. It is very good card, but still it makes so much hate amongst players, so it is better not to include this one into play. And I really don't like the potions, because I have to use 3-5 kingdom cards to make it with any point at all, so this takes some randomizing out of the game. So this expansion isn't really what I expected. I payed so much for it and got so little, quite pointless, but still as a fan I got it and am happy with it. Recommend only to hardcore fans...

item.name: Dominion: Black Market Promo Card
item.comment: This one adds little dimension to the game. I really like this card.

item.name: Dominion: Envoy Promo Card
item.comment: Usual. Nothing special.

item.name: Dominion: Intrigue
item.comment: I played the first 2 games of it by its own. I did not include Dominion base game. By itself, it is not as good as the original one, it has lot less options for strategy, but it add a lot to the base game. So this game should be played as expansion, like it is supposed to be played. Add more and more replay ability to the game.

item.name: Dominion: Prosperity
item.comment: Well, I'm writing this with a big smile. This one adds so many to the base game, that it makes me so happy. I mean who doesn't like the 7 cards and Platinum and Colony??? I'm already waiting for the next expansion...:D

item.name: Dominion: Seaside
item.comment: Truly great game. Much much better than Intrigue. It gives so much to the game, all those combo possibilities and duration cards as well. This is a must have expansion. I love island, pirate ship, embargo and native village cards. Some of them might seem to be overpowered, but with great opponents they are just cards. True card game, truly great game and as a true fan of Dominion, you have to own all the expansions. Recommend.

item.name: Doom: The Boardgame
item.comment: OMG! Can boardgames be that time taking and seriously angry making. Played it once, ok, good game. But to that again? In future maybe!!!

item.name: Doomino
item.comment: Dominoes! Classic! Must play!

item.name: Dora L'Exploratrice: Les Formes Avec Dora
item.comment: Boring even for children.

item.name: Dotto
item.comment: Ok, not a good game. Was a little nerve wrecking but thats it. Timer is different period every time so basically its all about luck, thats it. Not a fan of luck games.

item.name: Down Under
item.comment: Great strategy game! :D

item.name: Draco
item.comment: Great dexterity game. Not as good as pitchcar, but still a lot of fun...:D

item.name: Dracula
item.comment: Actually very slow game! And harder than I originally imagined. It seemed to be very easy strategy and memory game, but ooo was i wrong. Well, play and see yourself what i mean. overall very great game! Not super, but great!

item.name: Drunter und Drüber
item.comment: Played this game in army for the first time with buddies and we all liked the game. One of the oldest building games and quite good one as well.

item.name: Duck, Duck, Bruce
item.comment: Gamewright edition is more fun because of the game art, but the game is still the same...

item.name: Dungeoneer: Tomb of the Lich Lord
item.comment: Weird card game! Tried couple of times with my friend and we thought it was fun, but if I should play it right now, then I wouldn't!

item.name: Durak
item.comment: One of the most played card games besides poker in my life. In school this was the main game.

item.name: DVONN
item.comment: Another great abstract strategy game. Fan of those, but not very much people who share that passion with me!

item.name: E-Lektor Quiz Basic: Winnie The Pooh
item.comment: So far the version with the best art. but not as fun as the other versions.

item.name: E-Lektor Quiz Travel
item.comment: Travel version is so far the most boring one in the series.

item.name: E-Lektor Quiz Travel
item.comment: Another travel version and same boring as the other one.

item.name: Eagle Kingdoms
item.comment:
Seriously boring game. Setting the game up was fun, because it looks so good. The game board and the puzzle pieces are awesome, but then starts the play. Game play is awful. Just rolling the dice like crazy. I used the d8 dice as much as possible to make the game as interesting as I could in the given circumstances. Some pieces are very hard to remove from the game board, like 1 and 1 piece...this is hard. Which leaves the center piece rolling for a long time period. I used once again the red dice every chance in order to get 7 or 8 in order to remove from the middle just to end this game. I was finally able to get the game finished with score of 166 points. Quite boring game, which looked very good. I do not recommend this game. Buy this game only for these reasons: 1) You want to get a beautiful game. 2) You want to get 45 stands.
Not happy with this game.

item.name: Eat Poop You Cat
item.comment: Great party game

item.name: Eaten By Zombies!: We Have the Bomb! Promo
Eesti mälumäng
item.comment: One of the best local trivia games here. Very good questions. I think that they are just right amount hard! Just right!

item.name: Eesti Mälumäng (Travel)
item.comment: Only good things about this game is that the questions is newer than the board game version.

item.name: Eesti Mälumäng Juunior
item.comment: I'm a little disappointed. I was expecting more like the adult version of the game, but what i got was something way too easy. Well, it is a junior version, so what was i expecting? This is definitely childrens game, not suitable for adults, because of its simplicity. Takes away the fun. If you're adult, this game is not for you (it figures, it is junior:D). Recommend for kids!

item.name: Electronic Battleship
item.comment: This way it is little easier! Same as the regular game, but maybe a little more fun!

item.name: Elefun
item.comment: Not so fun to kids as one could figure, but more fun to adults like I saw! My sisters and my mother were all over the place to catch those butterflies! Very entertaining was to watch those mothers actually compete with each other! FUN!

item.name: Elfenland
item.comment: I like this one. One day I add Elfengold and play it again, but til that time I just leave it to shelf!

item.name: Elu On Selline!
item.comment: Very easy going game. Real luck and dice fest, but still there are very good strategy elements here. Very cool game!

item.name: Emerald
item.comment: I actually like this game. It has great components and easy to learn rules. It plays fast and well with 2 players! :D

item.name: Eminent Domain
item.comment: Superb game. Recommend!

item.name: Enchanted Forest
item.comment: Not the best children game I have played. Another variant for memory game in my humble opinion.

item.name: Englisch-Electric
item.comment: As far as the electric pen games go, this one has the connect 2 variant, which is not so good in my opinion.

item.name: Ententanz
item.comment: :D Big smile! Great game for the really really small ones.

item.name: Era of Inventions
item.comment: Very deep game I think. At first I thought, that there is nothing complex about it, but I was wrong. After first game I got the main ideas and then it was so much more fun and the feel good later factor also.

item.name: Eragra: The Game of Eras and the First Step
Erasta Eestimaist
item.comment: Since the game is Estonian made, I like it. What ever people say about it, the game is good and fun!

item.name: Escalation!
item.comment: Another game that can just be played with cards only with numbers. The theme once again is pasted on and game is itself quite luck based... One of Knizias worst designs...

item.name: Euroopa Mälumäng
item.comment: Big fan of trivia games, but this one is a little too hard. Well, little practice is needed:D

item.name: Excape
item.comment: This might be the funniest and coolest dice game I have ever played. I DO NOT like dice games, but this one is an exception. It is easy, it is fast and it is funny. Recommend to all to get this game, because it is light enough and fast enough to be a great filler game.

item.name: Ezelsbruggetje
item.comment: I have to say that this little children game is a great introduction into board gaming. Yopu have cards, you need to plan your moves and so on, so very good schildren game!

item.name: Fantasyland
item.comment: Fun children game! I like the way how giant always gets stuck in between trees! Very good children game!

item.name: Faqir
item.comment: Another Tactic release. This time the game isn't that bad. It actually can be played and more than once! :D

item.name: Farlander
item.comment: Different game than I'm used to, but still enjoyable:D

item.name: Farlander
item.comment: Traded for Aquädukt

item.name: Farlander
item.comment: Traded for Risk 2210 A.D.

item.name: Farlander
item.comment: Traded for Atlanteon-Battleship Express-Dragon Parade-Double or Nothing-Escalation!-Gold Digger-Clash of the Gladiators

item.name: Farlander
item.comment: Traded for Atlanteon-Battleship Express-Dragon Parade-Double or Nothing-Escalation!-Gold Digger-Clash of the Gladiators

item.name: Farlander
item.comment: Traded for Dead Man's Treasure

item.name: Farlander
item.comment: Traded for The Worst-Case Scenario Survival Game

item.name: Farlander
item.comment: Traded for Excape

item.name: Farlander
item.comment: Traded for Cosmic Encounter

item.name: Fast Flowing Forest Fellers
item.comment: As fas as the racing games goes, this one is not in the top 10 or anything, but it sure is a great and fun game to play. This is more like a family racing game and is better with more players than 3. 2 player game isn't very fun at all, but with 4 players the game can be quite chaotic... Recommend to all racing game fans...

item.name: Feed the Frogs
item.comment: Another one of the version for the classical game. Same game, but worse edition.

item.name: A Few Acres of Snow
item.comment:
Not as good as I hoped it will be. It is a great game but a dry game as well. It seems that Wallace never takes risks and just makes the same games over and over again. It has the deckbuilding in it yes, but you barely notice it. The game is slow and it has some minor bugs in it as well. We played few games and found like 3-4 bugs that I hope will get fixed or they are just not included in the rule book.
But I still rate this game at 7 since it is very strong design.

item.name: Fib Finder Extreme
item.comment: OK! New low for games! Question and answer game and so out of it! I know it is for kids, but even for those standards very low!

item.name: Fib Finder Extreme
item.comment: Worst game and I now have two of these...

item.name: Fiese Fliegen
item.comment: The idea is fun and all, but the mechanic the game has is very weak and therefore doesn't work all that well all the time. For me at least. As for the game, it gets boring for kids after a 5-10+ minutes.

item.name: Finstere Flure
item.comment: Very entertaining game! I like the monster movement in this game:D

item.name: Focus: Mälumäng
item.comment: 10 points because biggest trivia fan ever!

item.name: Foosball
item.comment: Foosball - This one is must have for all soccer (football) fans out there and no game room should be without one.

item.name: For Sale
item.comment: What I like most about this game is that it is so fast and easy. Basically it takes about 25 minutes from opening a box and finishing the first game. Easy and fun game, with great art and mechanics. Auction games are always fun...

item.name: Formula 1 Grand Prix
item.comment: Stupid and pointless game, but younger ones seemed to like it!

item.name: Formula 1 Grand Prix
item.comment: Same game and version as the other one, so stupid me for getting that one...

item.name: Formula D
item.comment: One of the best racing games I have played, but not the best. Most technical it is, but not the best. It offer a lot more than I need from a racing game.

item.name: Formula D
item.comment: One of the best racing games I have played, but not the best. Most technical it is, but not the best. It offer a lot more than I need from a racing game. Second version I got through mistake.

item.name: Founding Fathers
item.comment: I actually thought it was OK game, but not good or great game. It has some learning curve and needs players to see far more into the future than with other Matthews games. Overall I like the game and will give the game a second try.

item.name: Fredi ja Batonaator kosmoses
item.comment: Not anymore!

item.name: Fredi Ja Batonaator Loomaias
item.comment: Will not play it again!

item.name: Fredi Mereseiklus
item.comment: I don't know why even took the time...

item.name: Freecell
item.comment: This one is a great time killer. Mostly play when behind the PC, but back few years also on a table.

item.name: Frenzy
item.comment: [Dwarwes] Really good card game. Great battle game and really really fast game... Dwarwes deck has the best art!

item.name: Frenzy
item.comment: [Humans] Humans in this game is most pointless. Same as Undead, but worse...

item.name: Frenzy
item.comment: [Orcs] Orcs are the best deck in the game, but the difference is so small that the decks are pretty much the same...

item.name: Frenzy
item.comment: [Undead] Same as Humnas, but little better...

item.name: Friends Trivia Game
item.comment: Have played it with my sister a few times and so far I have lost every time. She is the biggest fan out there.

item.name: Frog Juice
item.comment: Actually not that bad game. I was afraid worse, since most Gamewright games so far ave been quite boring, but this one had something... Still not that good card game...

item.name: Frustration
item.comment: This one is McDonald's version and I have to say, that quite beautiful version! Same game though! :D

item.name: Funny Fishing
item.comment: Funny fishing - actually this one is more fun, since this version uses magnets! :D

item.name: Fzzzt!
item.comment: Great card game! A lot better than I expected it to be. I bought it because it was a deck building game and I have to say that I'm not disappointed.

item.name: Galerie der Diebe
item.comment: Played this one in army with my buddies. It is possible with great camera placement to make life hard for the thief and easy for the catcher.

item.name: A Game of Thrones (first edition)
item.comment: Bid disappointment for me. Didn't see all the gerat things about it I read about. The rulebook this game has, sucks bad as well.

item.name: A Game of Thrones: The Card Game
item.comment:
I just don't get the hassle about the TGOT games. Board game is boring as hell and the card game is broken and boring as well. Is it just me, but this is one of the most uninteresting card games of all time...long game play, slow, boring, broken rules and so on...
I don't know...

item.name: GaroBouc
item.comment: This is one of those games that make children excited a lot. Every time they wait to push the button to release the crazy goat...pure fun.

item.name: Genesis
item.comment: I liked the theme, but the game has nothing to do with the theme. It is simple abstract game, where you need to think you every move very very seriously, or else you simple lose to others and to the dark angel.

item.name: Geni!
item.comment: This old game show trivia is actually quite good. Nothing more to add, but try it yourself!

item.name: Geniaalne
item.comment: Best game Knizia ever made! Makes you think as hell...

item.name: Geopol
item.comment: Highly over hyped game here in Estonia. Nothing special, done million times, boring and poor design. Not worth the time.

item.name: Get out!
item.comment: Not what I expected at all! Quite boring!

item.name: Ghost Stories
item.comment: I think it was a fluke, but the first game was easy and we won it with 59 points. I saw no problems at all. Read the rules and checked everything - didn't forget anything. We'll see how the next games are going to be like. Any way, this is a great game.

item.name: Ghost Stories: B-Rice Lee
item.comment: Funny, but useless.

item.name: Ghost Stories: Chuck No-Rice
item.comment: Great one. this one I will use more.

item.name: Ghost Stories: Der Wachturm
item.comment: Small expansion. Doesn't change much.

item.name: Ghost Stories: The Village People Expansion
item.comment: It gives some new things, but still a really small expansion.

item.name: Giggle Wiggle
item.comment: Well, another children game I own. I like these children games, that come with different mechanics! This one giggles and wiggles and need some coordination, that is it!

item.name: Gin Rummy
item.comment: One game my grand mom thought me! Still quite good at it.

item.name: GIPF
item.comment: Another great one in the series! I'm still missing two from the series though...

item.name: Gipsy King
item.comment: Weird game! Played this with my girlfriend. She just randomly placed the caravans and I was making like the biggest plans ever and I lost all 3 games big...! WTF???

item.name: Go Bananas!
item.comment: Very fun game for kids, but I don't think that I will play this ever again...

item.name: Go Fish
item.comment: One game I haven't really gotten the point as well as I should have I think.

item.name: Go for Broke!
item.comment: Different kind of economical board game. Since I had partial rules for the game, I'm not sure I got the game right though!

item.name: Go! Gorilla
item.comment: Really fun game for kids and adults! :D Kinda frustrating when other are knocking down your monkeys..:D

item.name: Goa
item.comment: Very good auction game. This game have so many aspects how to play it. I guess that is why the game is so popular. You need develop and build and win auction in the middle. Great game for everyone!

item.name: Godzilla: Stomp!
item.comment: Great little card game. Really fast, really simple and very beautiful game. Takes 5 minutes to learn, 15 minutes to play. Something very easy and yet quite entertaining. Recommend.

item.name: Gooey Louie
item.comment: OK, you have to play this one with your kids! Guaranteed that they love it!

item.name: El Grande
item.comment: What can I say about that great game. Biggest thing I like about the game, is that it doeasn't have long play time. Most games like this have long playing time, like 2 hours. but this one you can ply like in 45 minutes and faster. A great game, I love it!

item.name: Guess Who: Disney
item.comment: Big fan of Guess Who games. Very good deduction game. So many things and ways you can deduct..!

item.name: Gulo Gulo
item.comment: Superb kids game. Easy and fast, lots of fun.

item.name: Hands Up
item.comment: I think this game is only fun with a lot of players and is perfect for a quick game. This can be played fast while you're waiting something or someone - like nice warming act! Not a waste of time! :D

item.name: Hansa Teutonica
item.comment: Yeah, not that good game. Kinda boring and slow for me and it seems you just do the same thing over and over again.

item.name: Hase und Igel
item.comment: Since I'm a really big fan of racing games, I really enjoy games like this! I like all the possible ways you can play this! You can hold back and strike like a hare or slowly and little by little move like a turtle! Very good game, very good entertainment! Definitely not a waste of time! Good buy...

item.name: HBO Comedy
item.comment: Very hard to keep track on score. The one who keeps score must know the game pretty well to it fast. Very much possibilities and strategies are almost unlimited. Nice strategy game.

item.name: Hea une mäng
item.comment: Actually it is not that bad game when you look at it as a Snake and Ladders in berserk. It has some kind of tactics, but again, when I take this game as a board game in a board game world it would score 1 or below, but as a another version of snake and ladders it is 6 solid points.

item.name: Heimlich & Co.
item.comment: Supposed to be first game with a scoring track. One of the best deduction games I know! :D

item.name: Hektor und Achill
item.comment: As far as card games go, this one is not that interesting. I like the idea and I can see the appeal, but I just don't like it...

item.name: Heroes of Graxia
item.comment: Great deck building game. I love the game. It has great interaction, but I really dislike the Prestige point cards and wound cards....

item.name: Der Herr der Ringe: Die Entscheidung
item.originalname: Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation

item.name: Hey! That's My Fish!
item.comment: Very entertaining game with strategic possibilities. For example the first game i had, i dropped out of the game almost in the middle, but since i had planned very carefully i still won with total score! So there are multiple ways how to play this game. Good game!

item.name: Hide & Seek
item.comment: Well, there is one great children game! I like different aspects the game has. It help your mind and other senses to develop. Recommend.

item.name: Hive
item.comment: Really really good abstract strategy game. I love this game and Agnes loves this game too. Super game in that genre... Recommend.

item.name: Hooked
item.comment: When I was a kid I saw this game and I really really wanted it and now, I really really don't. A kids game with little fun! I caught the first fish, second one was already boring. Maybe i should be like 6 or seven for the game, I don't know, but now when I'm in my twenties, it is quite boring! Still i liked how those fishes move their mouths!

item.name: Horse Fever
item.comment: This is the first horse race game I have played and it is fun. It is good game. It is kinda exciting to look how the horses move and to see if you win anything back from it. I made all bad bets and in the end lost the game, but still, this one is a keeper.

item.name: Hunajapuu
item.comment: Very beautiful looking game. The biggest problem is that the part start to break down guite easily, especially when children are little rough when pushing down the bears and pushing through the honey. Still, children love that game!

item.name: Hundimäng
item.comment: Since I don't have regular Werewolf game, this one is all I know and I love it. Great game.

item.name: I Will Survive
item.comment: Average party game. It has the acting part that most people in Estonia hate, so for this public here this game has a dark future...

item.name: Identik
item.comment: Not the best party game I have played (Alias still undefeated), but still a great party game anyway. So everyone who likes a good laugh and need a game to take to parties or gathering, this is a game to take with you. Recommend. Laughs guaranteed....

item.name: Identitet Okänd?!
item.comment: Great version of the Guess Who game, with multiple sets of faces!

item.name: Iglu Pop
item.comment: Very good game. I quite enjoyed it. People say i have very good sixth sense so i guess it might be true, because failure rate was almost none existent. So very fun game for everyone in every age!

item.name: Iglu Pop
item.comment: This one is my army made version of the game! Still great though!

item.name: Imago
item.comment: One of the best party games I know! Must have for all party gamers out there!

item.name: In a Pickle
item.comment: Ok, very interesting word game. The most of the game is open for interpretation, but very fun party and card game. But be warned, because this game is usually companied by arguments and angry words...! Recommend.

item.name: Inkognito
item.comment: Well, this is one of my favourite deduction games there is. It has everything you want from a game like this. I promise that you don't have to dissapoint in this game!

item.name: Insikt
item.comment: Very cool trivia game. Different than I'm used to, but still great!:D

item.name: Irondale
item.comment: I have to say that I actually quite enjoyed it. Very cool card game. It has so many possibilities. I think that Sanitarium is over powered, but that can be a good thing I guess....

item.name: Irondale: Irondale Expands
item.comment: I really like the New Start part of the expansion and the City Square. What I don't care about at all is Bank and Advancement cards. Hard to see the value in them...

item.name: The Isle of Doctor Necreaux
item.comment: I like the game idea, but it got kinda boring after some time. It is not hard, but there is also not much choices really in the game. You basically just roll and roll. I had a good roll day and card fell like flies and game were won before it started... Great idea, but not the best co-op game.

item.name: Izzi
item.comment: Big fan of puzzle games, and well, this was a mouthfull. Very satisfied with this one!

item.name: JAB: Realtime Boxing
item.comment: Fun, fun, fun. Laughed a lot when playing this game. Creates really great feeling and playing this is very very fast and fun experience! :D

item.name: Jag lär mig läsa
item.comment: Although this game is in Swedish and my swedish isn't very good it really doesn't matter because estonian and swedish use the same alphabet. Tried with my niece, can be played and quite fun and educational.

item.name: Jishaku
item.comment: The original rules give you few games, but this is great game to house rule...:D

item.name: Joonista ja Arva
item.comment: One of my girlfriends favorite games. She really like this game and she is pretty good in this game also! I have to admit, that I like this one also! Recommend.

item.name: K2
item.comment: Honest answer: disappointed. I read all the rules and reviews how people praised the game. I expected a lot from this game, but it turned into a little disappointment for me. There are good parts in the game, but not for me.

item.name: Kabe
item.comment: Since from like birth I have played this game and I have to admit that I was and still am really good. Quite amazing actually!:D

item.name: Kakuzu
item.comment: It is great game in its own category. I like this game a lot. This would be quite boring game without the 0 stone, which takes away your momentum to score 9 points a round. Great math and thinking game.

item.name: Kalamees
item.comment: Good old classic!!!

item.name: Kalevi kaardimängud
item.comment: Pretty much what I expected. Although I am proud once again, because every game made here is a good game! Nice one Meelis!

item.name: Kalevite Maa
item.comment: What was that? I mean how boring can you get? Very uninteresting game. Very. 4 just because it is made in Estonia.

item.name: Karambolage
item.comment: To be honest the game seemed little ridiculous to me at first, but after the first game it is actually quite OK. Something in this game makes it kinda addictive actually. You must try to do some trick shots and you must try to hit the most hard corners...:D

item.name: Kas oled targem kui 5B?
item.originalname: Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader?
item.comment: Very slow and easy game. No trivial challange and again - slow. Unclear rules and well, after the first game, really don't want to play again.

item.name: Katani Asustajad
item.comment: Fun game. Real king of dice fests, but there still is very large part of strategy and skill. Very good game, not boring like some games i know.

item.name: Katani asustajad: Linnad ja rüütlid
item.comment: This expansion changes game too much and takes away the Catan stupid luck and fun.

item.name: Katani Asustajad: Meresõitjad
item.comment: Hard to play with so big game layout. Where can I play it? No room, because all the boardgames take like half of all the living place. All and all the game is enjoyable and playable!

item.name: Kelgukoerad
item.comment: I actually liked all the possible ways the game is build up! I'm waiting all the new case files! To be honest, the game is quite random and the idea is not original.

item.name: Keltis
item.comment: Same game as the Lost Cities: The Board Game. Very Knizia like game:D Simple rules, and easy game play, so time not wasted. Recommend.

item.name: Key Largo
item.comment: I really like the island themed games and this one is no exception. It has some great moments in it and it seems to be best with 4 players. It is easy to learn and fast game play, great addition to my collection.

item.name: Kimble
item.comment: With this game I saw first time the popping die thing I was really amazed. The game itself is what is - classic. And i like classic games.

item.name: Kleine Fische
item.comment: Playable, but thats it!

item.name: Das Kleine Gespenst
item.comment: Have to say that this is a really weird game!:D

item.name: Kolm Põrsakest
item.originalname: 3 Little Pigs and the Big Bad Wolf
item.comment: Very fun children game! I actually laughed when people tried to use that rubber wolf to blow over houses. Very funny and great game for kids. Recommend!

item.name: Kung Fu Fighting
item.comment: Fast and easy card game. Not the best fighting game, but easy to teach to kids and light filler between other games.

item.name: kuuduk
item.comment: The box says that it is a unique game. Actually, not so much... It has basically all things from other games and for two players quite pointless game....

item.name: Lasse Pikku Jääkarhu
item.comment: This is a regular lotto game just with Little Polar bear pictures. Usual lotto, same boring!

item.name: Last Night on Earth Special Edition Soundtrack CD
item.comment: Some tracks are cool, but most are not scary, little funny even...:D

item.name: Last Night on Earth: "We've Got To Go Back!"
Last Night on Earth: All Hallows Eve
Last Night on Earth: The Zombie Game
item.comment: Not as good as I expected! To be honest, it got little boring at some times. Still very good Zombie game!

item.name: Level 8
item.comment: WTF! How boring can this game be! Seriously!! WTF!!! Waste of good money!

item.name: Littlest Pet Shop Game
item.comment: Boring game even for children!

item.name: Lõbus Loomapere
item.comment: Very good children game! I think that this more like for very little ones, 5-6 year old already be too old for this one!

item.name: Long Shot
item.comment: I really really like this game... Enough said...

item.name: Loomade kuningriik
item.comment: Same game as World Wonders but with animals. Little hard, because who knows these facts about animals? Noone:D So pretty much a guessing game, but there are little tactical sides, so not a total failure!

item.name: Loot
item.comment: Not very bad card game, actually quite fun. very fast and easy game, although the card luck sometimes made me very angry, but that is part of the game guess. Another great game from Knizia and this time the game actually goes with the theme as well...

item.name: The Lord of The Rings
item.comment: Although the game has no need for the theme, it is really pasted on there and basically the game is just roll and move, but for some reason the game is silly fun. I have to say that I did enjoy playing the game.

item.name: Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation (Deluxe Edition)
Lotus
item.comment: Great abstract strategy game! FUN!

item.name: Lübeck
item.comment: Super easy and super cool game. I like how light the game is. It remains on luck mostly, but with little skill you are able to turn it around and win the game. I like doing these big "jumps". Like having 3 cards, and then collecting one big pile and then get like 30 points at once! Great game.

item.name: Maailma Mälumäng
item.comment: I really don't like how they made topics in this game. Focus (1998) had better dividing then this game, but I liked the fact that you have choices at back ,which gives you opportunity to choose or just answer. Very fun game still...

item.name: Mad Scientist
item.comment: Card game where you have not so much choices actually. This seems to be more of a luck than a skill game...

item.name: MadWish
item.comment: Great party game! I think this should be played with at least 6 players or so. Then this game is fun!

item.name: Magic: The Gathering
item.comment: I have like 42 of them by a mistake! So, not really into that CCG stuff!

item.name: Make 'n' Break
item.comment: Surprisingly entertaining! I liked this game, because it never gets boring:D Recommend!

item.name: Make 'n' Break
item.comment: Surprisingly entertaining! I liked this game, because it never gets boring:D Recommend!

item.name: Marrakech
item.comment: I love abstract strategy games and this one is now exception. This is great fun and a lot of thinking, also very beautiful game as well - actual cloth carpets and wooden coins. Beautiful.

item.name: Martinis & Men
item.comment: Not worth the time. Very easy and extremely luck based game. No need for any skill, game is fixed into a pattern. Can be played solo with 5 hands as five players. Makes no difference.

item.name: Marvel Heroes
item.comment: I actually liked this game, but for me this game was way too long. Since I'm a big marvel heroes fan, I will recommend this one for all the other fans!

item.name: Masters Gallery
item.comment: Another great Knizia installment. Worth the time and effort. Great quality and great fun. Recommend.

item.name: Masters of Trade
item.comment: Ok, now this is what I call EXPANSION. It changes the all game. Rotterdam is OK game, but with this you will get a GREAT game...:D

item.name: Masu
item.originalname: Crunch: The Game for Utter Bankers
item.comment: Playable and finally a game where i can actually steal cards and its ok to do that!:D

item.name: Match 'Em
item.comment: Gets boring really fast!

item.name: Meejaht
item.comment: Very fun kids game with little dexterity. I was little fun for me as well, but for kids this one is pure gold.

item.name: Mees, kes teadis ussisõnu
item.comment: Not as bad as I originally suspected. Real dice fest, got pretty annoying, but at the end I actually wanted to go another round. So, worth to play...

item.name: Megastar
item.comment: I liked the idea of the game and thats the reason i got it. Very easy card game, but after a while (like 20 minutes) it gets too easy and boring. Made couple of games and play again maybe in year or so, if ever!

item.name: Mein erstes Electric
item.comment:
Another version of the great kids game I own. I first found the Looney Tunes version and then after one another found more and more. It seems every version I get is different and with some little new twist.
The version is part of the series and this one is for animals.

item.name: Memo Zoo
item.comment: Played that with my nieces and they loved that game. They are also very good at that game! Classic

item.name: Memoir '44
item.comment: Super fun war game. War games to me are very boring, but this one has the simplicity of a board game for it to be a hit. It had easy rules, fast game play and fun flow as well. Great game.

item.name: Men Are from Mars, Women Are from Venus
Metsa Peremees
item.comment: Not so good game. Very boring and real dice fest.

item.name: Mida võiksime teada olulistest avastustest ja leiutistest
item.originalname: What Everyone Should Know About GREAT INVENTIONS

item.name: Mida võiksime teada reisides mööda Euroopat
item.originalname: What Everyone Should Know About TRAVELLING IN EUROPE

item.name: Mida võiksime teada trendidest
item.originalname: What Everyone Should Know About TRENDS & LIFESTYLES

item.name: Millal viimati...?
item.comment: Ok! I played this game with my sisters and to be honest I wasn't very happy about the game. Not what i expected. Quite boring actually. I guess this game is more like a party game with max available players and with couple of drinks, then maybe!

item.name: Mille Bornes
item.comment: It is a good card game, but the luck factor is too high for me.

item.name: Mille Bornes
item.comment: 1971 Edition has something more. I would say a presence..:D Game still doesn't fit for me at all, since the luck factor is way too high...I still win, but still.

item.name: Minu Eesti Lauamäng: Teeme Koos Eesti Paremaks!
Modern Art
item.comment: Since i'm a big knizia fan, then i like this game also! Thats it!

item.name: Mord im Arosa
item.comment: *Super great. Surprisingly fun game.

item.name: Morskoi Boi
item.comment: Another version of the same game. Other one is better, this one is russian version!

item.name: Mousquetaires du Roy
item.comment: Great co-op game. It is actually more balanced than it more seemed to be. If you play against very good mylady, then even the best musketeers seemingly cannot win. But medium my lady and great musketeers are best way to play the game. With 2 players only is the easiest way to win! :D

item.name: Mr. Bucket
item.comment: Quite boring for kids game! :(

item.name: Muna või kana?
item.comment: Not what I expected! Not at all! Very weird game and simple, but 50/50 chance always ruins the game!

item.name: Myst
item.comment: I like the PC game a lot, but the board game is a little disappointment. The puzzle making took some time because the colors make it hard make any sense out of them. And after all the key pieces needed to score are in place, the rest of the puzzle is kinda pointless. Just waiting and hoping the get that sky together. The second phase of the game is the "game" part of board game, but when you have done good in puzzle round, you just tail the other player and undo everything he does and you win big. I have to say, this is a weird board game.

item.name: Myth: Pantheons
item.comment: Great card game and great trick taking game. It is a little too long for my taste, but my group seems to like it...

item.name: The Name of the Rose
item.comment: Wow. I really like this game. Best deduction game I have played ever. It has so many good out smarting part til the last second of the game. Really well done game...

item.name: NBA All Star: Officially Licensed Board Game
item.comment: I am really disappointed in this game. It is clear that newbie to games has designed it and no real testing were ever made. Game has more bugs than I can count and it is boring. Rules are badly written and game play is slow.

item.name: Neuroshima Hex!
item.comment: This copy of the Neuroshima Hex I bought with the help of my army buddies for another buddy of mine who got burned really really bad and since he liked the game so very much, I thought it would be nice to make it as a gift!

item.name: Nevo
item.comment: I have to say that I really enjoyed the game. I like the movement this game has and the scoring system is awesome...

item.name: Niagara
item.comment: Well, this game is quite fun, but is it worthy of SDJ award? I'm not sure about that yet, but it has some great potential, and it has a very neat looking and the idea is even better. I'm not the biggest fan of game flow on this one yet...

item.name: Nightfall
item.comment: I was ready for this game to be like a clone for Dominion, Thunderstone, Ascension and so on, but I was surprised, that this game is more about attacking and being aggressive than deck building. A loit more different than I expected it to be. Great game.

item.name: Nööbitsirkus
item.comment: Very entertaining kids game! Only for kids though! Recommend.

item.name: Oltre Mare
item.comment: Cool ship game, but not that good that I should choose this game from shelf, where this game is between like 50 other games!

item.name: Ord Mani
item.comment: Another great game show trivia! Nothing more!

item.name: Oregon
item.comment: This game I really like. It is fast and easy to teach/learn, also, the game ends always so fast, so you have to start thinking about your game from the very first card played.

item.name: Ostkampen
item.comment: Great abstract strategy game, but in my opinion it is way too hard game for the kids, since you have to think so many moves ahead and some of then are quite difficult moves. Great game, too hard for little kids.

item.name: Pack Donkey
item.comment: Ok. Can games be anymore fun?? Really fun and nerve wrecking game:D

item.name: Palju Õnne, Fredi!
item.comment: Not so bad as the rest of them, but still horrible!

item.name: Panda Monium
item.comment: Not impressed with this game at all. Quite boring game for adults I believe. Maybe if you have it on a party and people are drunk, then it could make some waves as a great games, but otherwise it should be played with small children only.

item.name: Pandemic
item.comment: I really don't know what to say about game THAT GOOD!

item.name: Pandemic: On the Brink
item.comment: It only makes the perfect more perfect!

item.name: Pandemie: Uitbreiding "De Generalist"
item.comment: Doesn't really matter if this is in the game or not!

item.name: Paras Paar
item.comment: Very easy game with my girlfriend! We kick ass:D

item.name: Past Lives
item.comment: For a roll and move game this one is a gem actually. It has a luck part, since you use dice to move, but still a good player will win it anyway. Great and easy game. Game length is all up to players.

item.name: Patrizier
item.comment: Oh, this game is fun! I really like this game! I don't know why! Just like! Get this and like this game with me!

item.name: PDQ: The Pretty Darn Quick Word Game
item.comment: Its quite good word game and there are so many ways how you can play this game so you never get tired of the game. Recommend to the word game fans...

item.name: Penguin
item.comment: Very Knizia game, but not very good. He always makes easy to understand and easy to play games, but this one is quite boring. I bought just because he is the author and i will not play this game a while. Recommend only to Knizia fans!

item.name: Penguin Pile-Up
item.comment: The game is extremely fun and actually a quite hard one also! Suitable for adults and for the whole family! Good buy!

item.name: Pentago
item.comment: Try to beat me in this game! Seriously - this game is my thing!!

item.name: Perry Rhodan: Die Kosmische Hanse
item.comment: Not the game in the 2-player series, but still very entertaining and to play juts one game in hard. You have to play one more. It has a lot of thing, but it is missing something I cannot put into words. Don't get me wrong - great buy and great game!

item.name: Pictionary Junior
item.comment: Had to play kids games when you're not a kid anymore! Just for kids!

item.name: Pictureka!
item.comment: Very entertaining game! It never gets boring. There are so many possibilities how you can play this and I'm pretty sure you can't remember all the pictures in this game! Recommend!

item.name: Piece o' Cake
item.comment: Not quite the board game I would like to play. Maybe if I was in army and I had no other games to play, then yes, this would be played.

item.name: Pippi Långstrump
item.comment: My version is very old and some pieces are missing, maybe that is why I didn't like this game very much! Quite boring and time taking...

item.name: Piraadid
item.comment: Pretty boring game!

item.name: Pirates
item.originalname: Pirates Of The Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
item.comment: This one like the most in the series! Here you actually have boats and people can be abducted. FUN!

item.name: Pirates of the Caribbean Buccaneer
item.comment: Cool game. I like the ships - they look cool! Game by 2 players is boring, but with like 4 players could be fun!

item.name: Pirates Of The Caribbean: Pirates III
item.comment: Quite boring pirate game. Very fast playable and basically no strategy can be made!

item.name: PitchCar
item.comment: OK! I wasn't expecting anything that fun when I got this one. Was little annoying that boarders keep getting loose, but after a little while you get used to it!

item.name: PitchCar Extension
item.comment: OK! I wasn't expecting anything that fun when I got this one. Was little annoying that boarders keep getting loose, but after a little while you get used to it! And in this pack there is jump what could have almost broken my window!

item.name: PitchCar Extension 5: The Cross
item.comment: Must have for a fan.

item.name: PitchCar Special Long Straights
item.comment: Well, there is no point having a second floor when you haven't these straights.

item.name: PitchCar: Stunt Race
item.comment: Buy more than one copy to build one epic stunt race.

item.name: Plitsch-Platsch Pinguin
item.comment: Light and fun gaming experience! Good filler game, never boring! :D

item.name: POG The Game
item.comment: :D Classic game for children I believe. Played the Chupa-Chups version as a kid and loved it:D

item.name: Pokker
item.comment: Well, who doesn't know how to play pokker?

item.name: Poliitiline Tsirkus
item.comment: To be honest, this game sucks ass! Really poor version of the great game!

item.name: Ports of Europe: Rotterdam
item.comment: Really cool game, but I have to say that the luck factor made me little angry. I needed a bread for all my 3 Production cards and I got no bread 6 times in a row. Of course I lost the game as well... But if you use the variant, that problem is gone...

item.name: Power Grid
item.comment: Very good game! I like everything about this game. So many way to beat your opponent. Strategical game and one of my favorites. Recommend to everyone!

item.name: The Princes of Florence
item.comment: When I first took this to my hand I looked at the rules I was like - what? But now after so many times playing this game, I can say that this game is one of my favorite games in my huge collection!

item.name: Prism
item.comment: [b]Signed by author:[/b] After the first game I am little surprised. I knew what the game was about before I got it, but after playing I am surprised. The game has actually much more combo possibilities than I thought, but it also takes longer than I thought, but that is not really a big deal.

item.name: Prism
item.comment: [b]Signed by author:[/b] Second copy of the same game given by very kind person so I could give it forward. Have yet to find the person to give the second copy.

item.name: Puerto Rico
item.comment: This is a great game, but not a superb game and this is for sure is not worth the top 3 position in BGG...

item.name: Pyramid
item.comment: Very cool magnet game. At first I was quite amazed again about the game system. Very fun to chase after other players. Recommend

item.name: Quarx
item.comment: Ok, this game is fun. I actually lost to my 8 year old niece. So everyone can be good in this game! Recommend...

item.name: Quo Vadis?
item.comment: Fun game. I like these kind of games.

item.name: Ra
item.comment: Ok, this game I have to play again. It plays best with large number of players. It makes it so much more fun and the auctions are crazy. Great design.

item.name: Ramses II
item.comment: Very cool memory game. Like memory game for adults of something!

item.name: Rapid Fire!
item.comment: Ok children game. Tends to break easily.

item.name: Rat-a-Tat Cat
item.comment: Weird game, but i have to admit, very entertaining! Fun:D Recommend!

item.name: Rehepapp
item.comment: Oh...milleks??

item.name: Reis Läbi Elu
item.comment: Game of pure luck! Seriously! There is very little strategy needed, just keep on rolling and that is it!

item.name: Reis Ümber Maailma
item.comment: Classic version and it is the best!

item.name: Relationship Tightrope
item.comment: The game has nothing to do with the theme, but it is a great auction game actually! :D Recommend.

item.name: Resident Evil Deck Building Game
item.comment:
I just love this game. I have played almost all other deck building game out there and this one is one of the best. It had some obvious mistakes, but it is in the theme really well and as a big Resident Evil series fan, this one is a gem.
Recommend.

item.name: Resident Evil Deck Building Game: Alliance
item.comment: It is true that the Resident Evil game is broken in many ways, but that actually makes the game fun. Leon's special ability is OP and some others. The allies part of the game makes it very easy...:D Still a great game.

item.name: Respond!
item.comment: Its fun at first, but gets boring quite fast! At to be honest, this game is actually really hard...:D

item.name: Richelieu
item.comment: Great tactical game. Easy to teach and fast to play.

item.name: Rinks & Lechts
item.comment: Very entertaining card game. I really like this game. It is super fast and fun also. It is actually so much harder to make difference on left and right with these situations, but it is fun and when you get the hang of it, the time just flies away...

item.name: Rising Kings
item.comment: [b]Signed by Designer[/b]: Surprisingly good game. At first after reading the rules, I was afraid that the game is going to be dull as hell, but I was wrong. And I'm happy that I was wrong. What surprised me most, was the scoring system the game has. I had so much less cards than Agnes, but I only lost with 1 point. If that was designed by purpose, than very well done indeed.

item.name: Risk
item.comment: Risk has been one of may favorite games from my childhood and it has been on Estonian shelves a long time. Definite 10.

item.name: Risk: Strateegiline Vallutamismäng
item.comment: Although it is little different and a real dice fest it is still very enjoyable and fun game. I just like everything about the game...:D Risk fan, what can I tell ya!

item.name: Roll for Gold
