item.comment: Ok, another dice game. I actually liked the idea when i read it from the box, but after playing like couple of minutes i saw, that it might be waste of. Well, it is not a total waste of time, because with 5-6 players it is pretty exiting!

item.name: Roll Through the Ages: The Bronze Age
Rolling Rocks
item.comment: My very first Stonehenge game and I'm disappointed. Not what I expected. After reading the rules I was excited, but game is not that great...

item.name: Rorschach
item.comment: This game can be actually fun when you always ask people after, what do they see in them. This makes some laughs...

item.name: The Royle Family Game
item.comment: Not as bad game as I could be. Maybe if i knew the tv show, it would be better!

item.name: Rumble in the House
item.comment: Fast and easy, but too light for my taste.

item.name: Rumis
item.comment: One of my favorites!

item.name: Rune Age
item.comment: Great game and different approach to a deck building. I really like the different scenarios and once again FFG has created a great game to expand...:D

item.name: Saaremaa
item.comment: OK. It is Estonian game but still, this game is boring. Same game as Kalevite Maa, so second time playing would be over kill for me!

item.name: Salasilm
item.comment: 5 points because the questions on the card is way too easy. There should be like a genius edition to the game or something then i would be like really big fan of the game, but since the game dosent have that then 5 points it is. Game says that 7 pluss, but i actually think it is good memory trainer for the little ones.

item.name: Say Anything
item.comment: Ok, since I played this game before Wits and Wagers, I really really liked the game, but after Wits and Wagers, it is not that good, but still great game compared to other party games out there! :D

item.name: Scarab Lords
item.comment: Since I'm really big Kinizia fan I plat this game from time to time. It is very good card game and even mu girlfriend likes this game!

item.name: Die Schlangen von Delhi
item.comment: I really really like this game. It is fun, easy and fast as well. Great filler and a great game. Can be played many many times in row without having to worry about it getting boring! :D

item.name: Scotland Yard
item.comment: This game is my friends favorite game. I like being Mr. X, but who doesn't:D. Alothough I like searching also, because no criminal can run from me. Very good entertainment and chance to everyone to show how smart and clever they are! Game you should play! Recommend!

item.name: Scrabble Original
item.comment: Oldest word game I have and I know. I like scrabble a lot, but its sad thats we estonians don't have estonian version of that game although russians have (like they have everything here)! Scrabble is classic word game and maybe the most popular one in the world. If you don't have it yet, get one and play, you will not regret. Recommend!

item.name: The Secret of Monte Cristo
item.comment: Pretty decent family strategy game. Easy to learn, teach and play. Not long, not boring, enough luck. Recommend.

item.name: Sex and the City Trivia Game
item.comment: Pay once and never again!

item.name: Die Siedler von Catan: Das Würfelspiel
item.comment: Great dice game, but it has very little to do with Settlers Of Catan. Very random and full of luck, like most dice games. Average.

item.name: Die Siedler von Catan: Seefahrer Erweiterung
item.comment: This one (fourth German edition) looks so much better then the Estonian version. Play is the same, but the looks is important too.

item.name: Snakes
item.comment: Made after classic snake game, but gets uncomfortable after the snakes gets bigger!

item.name: Snakes and Ladders
item.comment: Was really really fun when I was a kid, i had the circus version that soviet union had around, but now this game is pointless. Well, since it is a childrens game, it quite logical that now when i'm an adult, i find it kinda boring. Still it has 5 points, because 0 now and 10 when i was young, so, you know. If for kides, then recommend, if not, then NOT!

item.name: Snap!
item.comment: Quite boring card game!

item.name: Solitaire
item.comment: Get really boring after like 3rd time. 30 seconds to win this game!

item.name: Sõnamäng
item.comment: Best word game of that type there is! My family favorite game!

item.name: Space Alert
item.comment: Very good co-op game, but it is not 10 for me because of the game learning process is painful. Game is short, but it takes so so many plays until you can have a actually mission played...

item.name: Space Walk
item.comment: It is silly easy, but still a great game. Abstract strategy, but it is a game where you have to actually screw other player, since your own win depends on that...

item.name: Speedybag
item.comment: Don't play this one. Very boring, even for kids. Waste of time and waste of money.

item.name: Spider-Man & Friends Hide & Seek
item.comment: I gave this game 9 points because I like the idea for the kids. This game is pointless for adults, but as I watched my nieces playing it saw, that the idea is brilliant!

item.name: Spider-Man 3: The Ultimate Game
item.comment: OMG, how boring! Seriously boring! I was waiting the game to be over like in 10 seconds into the game!

item.name: Splash Attack
item.comment: Ok, its fun! This Nämm-Nämm part you have to when you catch a fish. Well, very easy game, since it is for children! Recommend for younger gamers under 10!

item.name: Star Trek Deck Building Game: Alternate Effect Captain Picard Promo
Star Trek Deck Building Game: Human Q Promo
Star Trek Deck Building Game: The Next Generation
item.comment: * Well, I was expecting the game to be more like Resident Evil, but it is not. It has some nice features and uses for deck building mechanism and I really like the scenarios the game offers you.

item.name: Star Wars - Kampen om Naboo
item.originalname: Star Wars Episode I: Attack on Naboo

item.name: Starmäng
item.comment: Usual dice rolling game, but in the land of Snake and Ladders it is one of the best, but in the land of board games...

item.name: Statis Pro Baseball
item.comment: Best baseball sim I have met so far! Really great game system! If you have change, try it!

item.name: Steps: Step by Step Game
item.comment: At first I was sure that this game sucks bad, but I have to admit, that this isn't true! Although I have no idea who is Steps, the game is still playable! Little over average party game!

item.name: Strada Romana
item.comment: Not very challenging game for 2 players, but with 3 or 4 it is more think than act kind of game. Recommend.

item.name: Straw
item.comment: Not very good card game, but playable. The straw card is pointless card since there is basically no way other players will play you to exactly to 50 points...

item.name: Strutsspelet
item.comment: Very fun memory game! Just choose one ostrich and look at his neck color. If you don't have that color add him to your farm. Played with my niece and she loved it!:D

item.name: Sudoku
item.comment: Sometimes when I have nothing to do, then its fun to take it down and to one or two games. Recommend to all:D

item.name: Summoner Wars
item.comment: I have to say that I'm very happy with this game! It has everything you might need from a card game! :D Recommend.

item.name: Summoner Wars: Guild Dwarves vs Cave Goblins
item.comment: Not the best deck in this one, but the game is still very very good...:D

item.name: Summoner Wars: HoMM vs HoN
item.comment:
Self made version by Martin and his fiance for my birthday. The cards are Heroes of Might and Magic versus Heroes of Newerth...
Very well done gem in my collection.

item.name: Summoner Wars: Phoenix Elves vs Tundra Orcs
item.comment: My favorite deck is Elves deck so far. I think they have the best attacking possibilities, but I haven't tried them all yet.

item.name: Sunken City
item.comment: Great game for a fast filler. Plays best with 4 players and very easy strategy... Recommend.

item.name: Sverige-resan
item.comment: Great game actually. Trivia and some adventure also. Recommend to trivia fans.

item.name: Talisman (Revised 4th Edition)
item.comment: It took really long time to learn that game. To be honest i even don't remember how to play that game. I remember only that I took so long to learn that game and that i liked that...that is all

item.name: Tanto Cuore
item.comment: *Much lighter game than Dominion and more prettier for the eyes as well. I really like the Chamber room idea this game has. Looking forward for future expansions in English.

item.name: Täringujalgpall
item.comment: I like this game! Although this game is king of dice fest it is still very entertaining and fun! Recommend.

item.name: Through the Ages: A Story of Civilization
item.comment: Superb!

item.name: Thunderstone
item.comment: Not as good as Dominion, but not worse either. The problem with the game is that it is heavily themed game (fantasy theme) and it is not that appealing to the wider audience. I had some trouble convincing Agnes to play the game, but saying that it is same as Dominion convinced her. The game has some other minor problems as well, like the player interaction. We played the game in total silence - that was kinda boring. And the first 15 minutes the symbols on the cards doesn't make sense, but later on, it doesn't bother anymore. I really like this game, but somehow the cards should have little bit more interaction between players to make it more interesting game. I say this though - I will buy all the expansions! :D

item.name: Thunderstone
item.comment: Not as good as Dominion, but not worse either. The problem with the game is that it is heavily themed game (fantasy theme) and it is not that appealing to the wider audience. I had some trouble convincing Agnes to play the game, but saying that it is same as Dominion convinced her. The game has some other minor problems as well, like the player interaction. We played the game in total silence - that was kinda boring. And the first 15 minutes the symbols on the cards doesn't make sense, but later on, it doesn't bother anymore. I really like this game, but somehow the cards should have little bit more interaction between players to make it more interesting game. I say this though - I will buy all the expansions! :D PS! Gave one copy to Martin (estland)

item.name: Thunderstone: Blade Trap Promo
item.comment: So far have got this one only once, but as far as the traps go, this one is pretty cool...

item.name: Thunderstone: Death Sentinel Promo
item.comment: Cool one! :D

item.name: Thunderstone: Doomgate Legion
item.comment: Treasures are great cards, but can make some frustration when they keep landing all in teh hands of one player... But as a fan of Thunderstone, I really like this one...

item.name: Thunderstone: Dragonspire
item.comment: I really like the new cool art for the basic cards. I don't like the second set of reference cards for some cards, but I like that it is also a stand alone game. Great addition to game, also Settings cards are great addition...

item.name: Thunderstone: For the Dwarf Promo
item.comment: Not the worst hero in the game, but not the best as well....

item.name: Thunderstone: Promo Pack
item.comment: It seems the more the game goes on the more it gives back its unique style...

item.name: Thunderstone: Thornwood Siege
item.comment: I really don't like this expansion. It has so many mistakes when you only play with cards from this expansion, so I prefer other expansions over this one.

item.name: Thunderstone: Wrath of the Elements
item.comment: I really really like Elementals. I think that they are one of the toughest monsters in the game. Great expansions that brings so much new cool stuff...

item.name: Thurn and Taxis
item.comment: Great strategy game, but I have played better ones. I would like to play it more! :D

item.name: Thurn and Taxis: Power and Glory
Thurn und Taxis
item.comment: Gave away in G4GG lotteries...

item.name: Thurn und Taxis
item.comment: Gave one copy to Martin (estland)

item.name: Ticket to Ride
item.comment: Great train game. Fast and fun, easy to learn. Family game. Every one can play it. Since I got Europe before the original Ticket To Ride, I have to say, that Europe is a lot better that the first one. I haven't so far played the Märklin or others, so right now I have to sat, this this is one of the best train games out there, but not as good as Europe version.

item.name: Ticket to Ride
item.comment: Great train game. Fast and fun, easy to learn. Family game. Every one can play it. Since I got Europe before the original Ticket To Ride, I have to say, that Europe is a lot better that the first one. I haven't so far played the Märklin or others, so right now I have to sat, this this is one of the best train games out there, but not as good as Europe version. Second copy I got by mistake.

item.name: Ticket to Ride: Europe
item.comment: Very good! There is nothing more to say that 2700 people haven't said already!

item.name: Ticket to Ride: Märklin
item.comment: I played this one as the last one in the series and the whole new passengers thing was a new thing to get used to and I didn't took it in actually til the end. Besides one of my passangers came headless as well...:D TTR is a great series, but I consider this as the weakest one in it.

item.name: Ticket to Ride: Nordic Countries
item.comment: This game has TALLINN in it, so it has to be a great game. Seriously, each game that has TALLINN or REVALER is a great game! :D Not the best in TTR series, but not the worst either.

item.name: Ticket to Ride: The Card Game
Ticket to Ride: USA 1910
item.comment: Bigger cards are better! More tickets means more points.

item.name: Tiki Mountain!
item.comment: Another racing game and as a big fan of racing games, this one I like. It has some minor things I don't like, but overall it is very easy and fast game, which could be great children game, if the cards would be a little easier to understand for smaller ones. Recommend this for all humor and racing games lovers...:D

item.name: Tobago
item.comment: This game I really liked. Very fun to play and easy to learn. Treasure finding is always a fun thing and you just have to love all the possibilities. Besides, the treasure giving process is a game itself! :D Recommend to all players.

item.name: Tom and Jerry
item.comment: Not bad, not bad at all! I like this game and even played it like 10 times with kids. They like it very much!

item.name: Tomb: Cryptmaster
item.comment: 3 player minimum and definitely the red side of the board, then the game is great and playable easy! :D Recommend.

item.name: Top oder Flop
item.comment: This game is actually better than I expected. I like movie themed games a lot, so this was the main reason for getting the game. After the first play I liked the game a lot. I think this game offers a lot of possibilities and strategies as well. I like the rules, where not owning any influence on certain movie only means you have 0 influence, so with negative movies, it is great to get yours below 0 and let other person suffer for their mistakes. Great movie themed card game. Fast and easy to learn.

item.name: Topology
item.comment: Great abstract game. Superb scoring possibilities.

item.name: Torres
item.comment: My girlfriend hates this game! She says that this game sucks because you have to be so greedy to win! Well, I am greedy!

item.name: Touché
item.comment: Little weird game! But since i like patter building games I like this one also!

item.name: Travel Edition Hungry Hungry Hippos
item.originalname: Hungry Hungry Hippos Fun on the Run Game
item.comment: Not as good as the big one. But still not that bad for playing!

item.name: Treasure Chest
item.comment: Princes of Florence expansions (2-player and Muse)

item.name: Tribune: Primus Inter Pares
item.comment: Great game. Looking forward to playing it again with slightly bigger group than 2...:D

item.name: Tricky Bid
item.comment:
One of the best trick taking game I have played. It has the great betting side as well. Trick taking is classical part of the game. Somehow this game can mix them very well.
Great trick taking game. Recommend.

item.name: Triumvirate
item.comment: Suprisingly good game. I wasn't sure about the game at first, but after a few minutes I got into it and really like it. This one will get more table time...

item.name: Troyes
item.comment: Really good dice game. The dice luck is gotten down to almost zero... Great and beautiful board game. I really really love the dice buying part which makes it really clever and new game for me. Recommend. High game design quality.

item.name: Tsirkus
item.comment: Classical game in my family! Very good game actually, but not very interesting for an adult!

item.name: Tubateater
item.comment: Extremely fun party game. Recommend to all party gamers. :)

item.name: Tuk-Tuk Taxi
item.comment: Cool game! I like this game! Somehow it seems to be so different than other games and so easy also!:D

item.name: Tumblin-Dice
item.comment: *This game cannot be played only few times. Just superb finger flicking...

item.name: Turbulento
item.comment: Quite unexpected how hard it actually was to turn these things around. To be honest, I sucked bad at this game...! Really bad, but I liked the idea and it is not that easy to remember the places for the animals when you try to hit things....:D

item.name: Turn the Tide
item.comment: Very surprisingly good game. It was on my shelf for like a year before I took it down and I'm happy I did. Very strategic and fun game. Every one has almost equal chance in the game:D Great art as well with the sheep! :D

item.name: Two by Two
item.comment: [b]Signed by author:[/b] I'm a big sucker for island games and I also love family games. This one is very easy to learn and fun and fast. I really really love island themes for some reason and this one has it nailed very well. The game is fun and it will get more table time for sure.

item.name: Ugg-Tect
item.comment: *For Secret Santa 2012*

item.name: Uncle Chestnut's Table Gype
item.comment: Very interesting abstract strategy game. It has luck, but you can control how and when you need the luck. It is actually great fun to see what your opponent is thinking and trying to do. Great and fun game.

item.name: Up And Down
item.comment: Actually very good memory trainer and patter recognition game. Recommend for the younger gamers and for the older ones who might think that memory isn't what it used to be!

item.name: Uskumatud Seiklused Energiamaal
item.comment: The game is beautiful, but the game itself is not that good. It has some ideas, but the game is boring. 5 points just for the art side!

item.name: Uus Alias
item.comment: Not so good as the original, but still very good game!

item.name: Vallatu Alias
item.comment: Well! I'm not that happy with game! I was hoping oh so much more because of the Alias. Well, still this game is very very good!

item.name: Vicious Fishes
item.comment: It is a ok game, with rookie mistakes made in the looks and quality of the game. It fell apart on me with in hours.As for the game, it is playable, but it won't get much play time in my family.

item.name: Võidab see, kel on surres kõige rohkem asju
Võlusaapad
item.comment: OK. This game is boring and really annoying. All the time you have to change into skis and off and all the other boot kinda things (foot wear)! Children game.

item.name: Warhammer: Invasion – March of the Damned
Warhammer: Invasion – Path of the Zealot
Warhammer: Invasion – Redemption of a Mage
Warhammer: Invasion – The Burning of Derricksburg
Warhammer: Invasion – The Fall of Karak Grimaz
Who eats whom: The food chain boardgame
Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
item.comment: Since my version is UK version, some questions is almost impossible for me to know. Otherwise very good trivia game, easy handling and fun party game. Only in sober environment though... Recommend to all trivia fans out there!

item.name: Wind River
item.comment: Not what I expected, but still not a bad game. Slower than I thought and more complex as well, but the easiest tactics are just to go with 3 huts and start bringing in more in the end.

item.name: Wits & Wagers
item.comment: Much better party game than I expected. The best way in the game is if you know the answer and then manipulate with your answer to get better changes for the right one, as to get more back from your chips. Really well designed game!

item.name: World of Warcraft: The Boardgame
item.comment: Very long game, but quite enjoyable also. I do not know nothing about Wow, but the game is great and fast paced actually... Second game is twice as fast as the first one and that much more enjoyable as well...:D Recommend.

item.name: Worm Up!
item.comment: Now that is a fun family game. So easy and so simple, so fast and so great...

item.name: The Yeti Slalom
item.comment: For children only. We played with adults and the dice luck is way way too important in this game, so I don't recommend this game to any serious gamer.

item.name: Yetisburg: Titanic Battles in History, Vol. 1
item.comment: I really wanted to like this game, but it just didn't go with me. I hate games where I have no control over my own men. Here they actually shoot my own men...that is annoying. I like the idea with Yetis and stuff, but the game is not that good...

item.name: ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: Better Red Than Undead
ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: Epic Zombie Horde Promo Card
ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: Night of the Thinking Dead
ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: Slashers, Killers, and Creepers
ZOMBIE APOCALYPSE: Til Un-Death Do Us Part
Zombie Fluxx
item.comment: Very entertaining card game with simple rules to follow. It was my first play of Fluxx and Zombie Fluxx, but those zombies were kinda annoying at first, but when aquiring some keeper cards, it were so easy. This one will definitely get more games played...

item.name: Крутые Гонки
item.comment: Not as bad as I originally suspected. Playable and quite fun...

item.name: Сокровища Фараона
item.comment: Very cool children game. I like running around the pyramid an doing all the different assignments. Very cool game!:D

item.name: Шерлок Холмс
item.comment: Not at all what I expected! BAD!
